prop.caption: nodeset
prop.description: how to retrieve the nodeset. This is a combination of model name and an xpath statement seperated by a colon (i.e. mdlUsers:users)

prop.caption: method
prop.description: the name of a function that returns a nodeset.

prop.caption: value
prop.description: an xpath which selects the value of each node in the nodeset.

prop.caption: count
prop.description: the number of visible items in the list at the same time.

prop.caption: sort
prop.description: an xpath on which the list is ordered.
